amendment.description: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the Student Financial Assistance Program by $9.25 billion, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Student Financial Assistance by $9,250,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 350 (Roll no. 654).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 350 (Roll no. 654).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
